alert.note: Alert for Bryan (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 1:17PM CDT until May 19 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Bryan County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 117 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Colbert, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Durant, Colbert, Bokchito, Achille, Cartwright, Blue, Utica, Albany, eastern Lake Texoma, Calera, and Wade. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
